about.details:
Incorporated in 1994, Sharp Chucks and Machines Limited is engaged in the manufacturing of forging and graded casting machined components of tractors and other automobiles, as well as power chucks, lathe chucks, drill chucks, and other machine tool accessories for tractors, automobiles, material handling & earth moving equipment, railways, defense, machine tools, the DIY industry, and so on.

The company's product portfolio includes:

  1. Forging products: This includes Gear, Dog Clutch, Scaffolding, C Clamp Spanner, Wrench Axe, Ball Pein Hammer, Cross Pein Hammer, Machinist Hammer, Sledge Hammer, Splitting Maul, Stoning Hammer Hatchet, Combination Spanner, Splitting Axe, Splitting Wedge, Fireman Axe, Michigan Axe, Hunter Axe, Drilling Hammer, Claw Hammer, Camp Axe, Single Bit Axe.
  2. Casting products: This includes Brake Housing, Piston Trumpet Housing, Wheel Hub Kit, Rear Cover, Bell Housing, Front Axel Braket, Gear Box, B.P Shaft Carrier, Brake Drum, Front Axel Housing, Lift Arm, Ram Cylinder, Rear Turnion, Planetary Carrier, TP Carrier, Cage, Steering Arm, Lift Housing, PTO Housing, Fly Wheel, Gear Casing, Cylinder Block, Plannet Carrier M Star, Support Front Axle, Plate Input Retainer, Temper Head.
  3. Machine components: This includes Power Chucks, Lathe Chucks, Drill Chucks, and Machine Tools Accessories.

The company has two manufacturing units located in Jalandhar consisting of three foundries having an installed capacity of 30000 MTPA and Machining facilities consisting of VMC, CNC, and other machinery having an installed capacity of 14400 MTPA, and one forging unit consisting of hammers, billiard heaters, etc. having installed capacity of 3600 MTPA.

faqs.question: What is the Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO is a SME IPO of 2904000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹16.84 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹58 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 29, 2023, and closes on October 5, 2023.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO opens on September 29, 2023 and closes on October 5, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO?
faqs.answer: Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,16,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO will be done on Monday, October 9, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, October 11, 2023. Check the Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sharp Chucks And Machines IPO listing date is on Thursday, October 12, 2023.
